text:
Hi Everyone , Hope you all are well?

I have one question if you can help me. One of my client created React theme and using that in HubSpot. From where I can access the theme and edit theme as per requirements.

Can you please help me ?

Thank You
Pankaj

Hi all!
I noticed all HubSpot themes have this code before calling all the CSS files:
```<style>
a.cta_button{-moz-box-sizing:content-box !important;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box !important;box-sizing:content-box !important;vertical-align:middle}.hs-breadcrumb-menu{list-style-type:none;margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;padding:0px 0px 0px 0px}.hs-breadcrumb-menu-item{float:left;padding:10px 0px 10px 10px}.hs-breadcrumb-menu-divider:before{content:'›';padding-left:10px}.hs-featured-image-link{border:0}.hs-featured-image{float:right;margin:0 0 20px 20px;max-width:50%}@media (max-width: 568px){.hs-featured-image{float:none;margin:0;width:100%;max-width:100%}}.hs-screen-reader-text{clip:rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);height:1px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute !important;width:1px}
</style>```
Someone here knows how to remove it? It's doing nothing on my website but I can't find documentation about it.
Examples:
• <https://design-assets.HubSpot.com/session/home>
• <https://design-assets.HubSpot.com/growth/home>
Thanks!
<#C2YH119N2|hubl> Hello, I'm having issues with *crm_associations()* function for all my objects. It keeps returning empty array. Doesn't matter custom or default.
